org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re
Class RERewritePattern

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.RERewritePattern

public class RERewritePattern
extends java.lang.Object

A RERewritePattern object contains several syntactical rewrite patterns represented as a map from a pattern to a replacement.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
